body.name: Electrohome Huntley Powered Bookshelf Speakers with Built-in Amplifier and 3" Drivers for Turntable, TV, PC and Wireless Music Streaming Featuring Bluetooth 5, RCA and Aux (EB10)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 12 hrs 38 mins.
features: WARM AND NATURAL SOUND - Immerse yourself in the full-bodied audio playback of these compact powered bookshelf speakers that produce well balanced sound
ULTIMATE AUDIO VERSATILITY - Enjoy a wide range of usage options; easily connect your turntable, TV, computer, gaming console or easily pair your mobile device for wireless Bluetooth music streaming
QUALITY PERFORMANCE COMPONENTS - Designed utilizing high performing components including 3-inch drivers to create an acoustically balanced sound profile for warm and detailed playback
CLASSIC RETRO WOOD DESIGN - Revel in the warm, resonance-free sound from these handcrafted acoustically tuned wood cabinets with rear ported design for enhanced bass response
MULTIPLE CONNECTIONS WITH BLUETOOTH 5 - Connect seamlessly to multiple sources through RCA, Aux-In or Bluetooth 5 to enjoy your favorite music, podcasts and videos anywhere

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Electrohome Huntley Powered Bookshelf Speakers offer excellent performance while effortlessly connecting to any audio source so you can focus on the music. Adorn any music sanctuary with these retro-inspired powered speakers without sacrificing modern features.

Impressive Performance Designed to deliver accurate audio with clear vocals and satisfying soundstange, the compact cabinet and driver work together to provide a natural, balanced sound free from distortion. Enjoy music as it was intended to be heard. Device Compatibility Connect your turntable, TV, computer through the wired connections or pair your mobile device for wireless Bluetooth music streaming. Switch between devices with a simple click on the control knob and determine the selected input with the LED indicator. Quality Components Built with performance in mind, the 3-inch drivers work together to create an acoustically balanced sound profile allowing you to revel in the warm and detailed playback from the speakers. Powered by a low distortion 20 Watt Class D amplifier to ensure clarity and quality from audio playback. Classic Retro Cabinet Design Featuring a beautiful hand-crafted cabinet that is custom built with rear port design to deliver a warm and resonance free sound. Rear facing controls ensure a clean and sleek appearance so the speakers look as good as they sound.

SPECIFICATIONS UNIT COLOR: Teak SPEAKER CONFIGURATION: 1 Way – 1 Driver Bookshelf Speaker System with Integrated Amplifier (Pair) CABINET MATERIAL: MDF (Medium Density Fiberboard ENCLOSURE: Tuned Rear Port Bass Reflex Design WOOFER: 3-inch Polypropylene Woofer with Butyl Rubber Surround AMPLIFIER POWER: Class D 20 Watts Continuous Average Output (2x 10 watts RMS) FREQUENCY RESPONSE: 100Hz - 16KHz (+/-5dB) BLUETOOTH: Yes, Bluetooth 5.0 WIFI CASTING: Pairs via Bluetooth with Google Home, Amazon Echo, and AppleTV (EB10 is not a WiFi speaker) INPUTS: RCA L/R, Bluetooth, & 3.5mm Aux In SUBWOOFER OUTPUT: No PHONO PREAMP: No POWER: Input: 120V 60Hz DIMENSIONS: 6.14 x 4.61 x 5.31 inches (15.6 x 11.7 x 13.5 cm) SPEAKER WEIGHT: Active Speaker: 2.16 lbs (0.98 kg) Passive Speaker: 1.92 lbs (0.87 kg) WHAT'S INCLUDED EB10 Powered Bookshelf Speakers (pair) 6ft Power Cord 8ft 22 Gauge Speaker Wire Quick Start Guide Lifetime Customer Support

Huntley (EB10) Berkeley (EB20) McKinley (EB30) Tweeter N/A 1 inch Silk Soft Dome 1 inch Silk Soft Dome Woofer 3-inch Polypropylene Woofer with Butyl Rubber Surrounds 3-inch Polypropylene Woofer with Butyl Rubber Surrounds 4 inch Polypropylene Woofer with Butyl Rubber Surrounds Inputs RCA L/R, Bluetooth, & 3.5mm Aux In RCA L/R, Bluetooth, & 3.5mm Aux In RCA L/R, Bluetooth, & 3.5mm Aux In Amplifier Power Class D 20 Watts Continuous Average Output (2x 10 watts RMS) Class D 30 Watts Continuous Average Output (2x 15 watts RMS) Class D 30 Watts Continuous Average Output (2x 15 watts RMS) Frequency Response 100Hz - 16KHz (+/-5dB) 100Hz - 20KHz (+/-9dB) 65Hz - 20KHz (+/-9dB) Remote Included N/A N/A ✓ Speaker Dimensions 6.14 x 4.61 x 5.31 inches (15.6 x 11.7 x 13.5 cm) 8.27 x 5.12 x 6.69 inches (21.0 x 13.0 x 17.0 cm) 10.4 x 6.5 x 7.6 inches / 26.42 x 16.5 x 19.4 cm (HxWxD)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had purchased a garrard turntable and Jayco pre amp. Purchased speakers iLive brand. Horrible loud humming. Then I purchased these little guys. I was unsure how they would be given mixed reviews. So happy that they sound excellent and the loud humming is no longer present. Love the responsive volume control nob. Thought the small size may decrease quality of sound but not so. Quality build. Not cheap. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound looks good
reviews.reviewText: I like these alot, the sound is great but obviously the bass is missing quite a bit, im not surprised with this size of speakers i was just hoping they would have a tad more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little speakers for the price
reviews.reviewText: These small speakers are exactly what I was looking for! I used them to have a mini stereo setup because my living situation doesn't allow for my large full setup. They sound quite good considering they each only have a 3" driver. Lows are decent for the size, and highs aren't bad at all. I live the look and the fit and finish. The biggest thing I really wish they had was a phono pre-amp. I know this would raise the price, but I think most people would pay the extra for that. Or at least have it optional on all of the speakers. But overall I'm very happy with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It sounds really good. Like it a lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quit working after 2 months
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a gift for my daughter. Worked fine for a while and then nothing. Cheap junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to set up and connect. The sound quality is great. For these to be small, they have a great sound!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cost/benefit analysis bears out
reviews.reviewText: You'll get what you pay for with these little guys. Mediocre sound, but cheap and will fit just about anywhere.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a great little speaker system
reviews.reviewText: It's great! It links up to my record player and cell phone nicely.I was initially worried because the record player volume was quite low, until I realized I hadn't factored in an amplifier (and the record player didn't have a built-in one).Sound quality lost one star because they're not powerful speakers, but, for their size and cost, they're worthwhile.

These speakers are pretty awesome and exceeded my expectations by FAR! The quality is much higher than the price, and the price is excellent. The quality is beyond what you would expect. The Bluetooth connection was simple, fast, and has been the only connection I’ve used so far. It has multiple connection options aside from Bluetooth if you need them though. I highly recommend these for anyone who just enjoys music! The sound is fantastic and I’ve never experienced any lags or glitches. Love these!

reviews.reviewTitle: Just a basic loudspeaker for background music
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is only marginal with distortions now and then for vocal music with RCA connection to my CD player though there were no problrms with bluetrooth when paired with my iphone. I have switched the RCA input wires around with all those I have on hand but with no avail. I would suggest it only for soft background music.Finally decided to return it.
Used to listen to vinyl on turntable.

These retro-aesthetic speakers are cute and stylish. They are small-ish, so the fit nicely on shelves or bookshelves. They have an attractive wood veneer, and they hearken back to the 50s or 60s.They sound good. Obviously, they are not the best hi-fi units out there, but they are surprisingly good for their size. They complement any bedroom or office space nicely.They have speaker wire between the two to ensure consistent sound, and there are multiple ways to input the sound to the speaker (I use the Bluetooth).Overally, very satisfied with these cool items.
